about.details:
Incorporated in 2017, Identixweb Limited is a technology company specializing in Shopify app development and custom web solutions.

The company offers services including Shopify app development, web app development using PHP and React, and WordPress plugin development.

With over 50 professionals, Identixweb has developed more than 35 public Shopify apps and completed over 100 projects, serving various industries such as e-commerce, fashion, fintech, and SaaS.

Services:

  • Shopify Application Development: The company builds Shopify apps to enhance store functionality, streamline operations, and boost sales.
  • Node.js Development: The company uses Node.js to create fast, efficient servers for responsive websites and applications.
  • PHP Development: The company develops PHP-based websites and apps for dynamic, interactive, and database-integrated web experiences.
  • Web Application Development: The company creates user-friendly web applications for shopping, email, and social networking across devices.

Products Portfolio:

  • Stellar Delivery Date & Pickup: This app is a solution for order delivery management.
  • iCart Cart Drawer Cart Upsell: Grow your Shopify store's average order size with iCart's complete cart upsell & cart cross-sell solution for growth-focused Shopify merchants.
  • TablePress - Data Tables: TablePress allows you to create tables that can be embedded into blogs, pages, or text widgets with a simple shortcode.
  • WordPress Plugin: With this you can accelerate online sales with an outstanding WooCommerce upsell plugin, driving more conversions and boosting your revenue effortlessly.

As of February 28, 2025, the company has a total of 64 Employees.

Competitive Strengths:

  • Skilled Professional Team and Strong Leadership
  • Tailored Solutions
  • Comprehensive Development Services
  • Client-Centric Approach
  • Innovation and Adaptability

anchorInvestors.summary: Identixweb IPO raises Rs 4.73 crore from anchor investors. Identixweb IPO Anchor bid date is March 25 2025. Identixweb IPO Anchor Investors list

contactDetails.full_address: Identixweb Limited, Plot No. 240 C. S. No. 1730, 1st Floor Nehru Nagar L. H. Road, Sy. No. 46/A+2 TPS-4 Surat – 395006

faqs.question: What is the Identixweb IPO?
faqs.answer:
Identixweb IPO is a SME IPO of 3080000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹16.63 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹54 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on March 26, 2025, and closes on March 28, 2025.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Identixweb IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Identixweb IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Identixweb IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Identixweb IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Identixweb IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Identixweb IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Identixweb IPO opens on March 26, 2025 and closes on March 28, 2025.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Identixweb IPO?
faqs.answer: Identixweb IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Identixweb IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Identixweb IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Identixweb IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Identixweb IPO will be done on Tuesday, April 1, 2025, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, April 2, 2025. Check the Identixweb IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Identixweb IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Identixweb IPO listing date is on Thursday, April 3, 2025.

reservation.summary: Identixweb IPO offers total 3080000 shares. Out of which 584000 (18.96%) allocated to QIB 440000 (14.29%) allocated to NII 1026000 (33.31%) allocated to RII and 876000 (28.44%) allocated to Anchor investors.

subscriptionStatus.summary: The Identixweb IPO is subscribed 26.15 times on March 28 2025 6:19:32 PM (Day 3). The public issue subscribed 14.38 times in the retail category 11.19 times in the QIB category and 73.46 times in the NII category. Check Day by Day Subscription Details (Live Status)
